## WorkspaceAudio.load() method

Load an audio file. Cache it, ready for instantaneous playing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(filenames: string[], name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

filenames


</td><td>

string\[\]


</td><td>

List of file types in decreasing order of preference (i.e. increasing size). E.g. \['media/go.mp3', 'media/go.wav'\] Filenames include path from Blockly's root. File extensions matter.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

name


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Name of sound.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
